tool_description:
This API performs following functions -  
User Addition, User Retrieval,  Updation & Deletion
name: User Management
title: User Management

api_list.name: Add User
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to store user information like - user id, user first name,  last name, address, contact.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-management1.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://user-management1.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
